statements: SELECT * FROM Paintings;
SELECT painting_name, painting_artist FROM Paintings WHERE painting_year > 2000;
SELECT painting_name, painting_year FROM Paintings ORDER BY painting_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM Paintings WHERE painting_artist LIKE 'Vincent%';
SELECT id, painting_name FROM Paintings WHERE painting_year BETWEEN 1800 AND 1900;
SELECT * FROM Paintings WHERE painting_artist = 'Leonardo da Vinci' ORDER BY painting_year DESC
SELECT painting_name, painting_artist FROM Paintings WHERE painting_year > 1800 ORDER BY painting_year ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Paintings WHERE restoration_history IS NOT NULL
SELECT painting_name, painting_year FROM Paintings WHERE condition_report LIKE '%excellent%'
SELECT painting_name, painting_year, condition_report FROM Paintings ORDER BY painting_year ASC, painting_name
SELECT * FROM painting WHERE artist_name = 'Leonardo da Vinci';
SELECT id, painting_name, artist_name FROM painting ORDER BY creation_year DESC;
SELECT MAX(creation_year) FROM painting;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) FROM painting GROUP BY artist_name;
SELECT painting_name, condition_report FROM painting WHERE creation_year > 1800;
SELECT * FROM painting WHERE artist_name = 'Vincent van Gogh';
SELECT * FROM restoration WHERE restoration_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT id, painting_name, artist_name FROM painting WHERE creation_year > 1900 ORDER BY creation_year DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT painting.painting_name, restoration.restoration_date, restoration.treatment_description FROM restoration INNER JOIN painting ON restoration.painting_id = painting.id;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) AS total_restorations FROM painting INNER JOIN restoration ON painting.id = restoration.painting_id GROUP BY artist_name HAVING total_restorations > 1;
SELECT id, name, artist, year_created FROM paintings;
SELECT * FROM paintings ORDER BY year_created DESC;
SELECT name, year_created, restoration_history FROM paintings WHERE year_created > 2000;
SELECT artist, year_created FROM paintings WHERE artist = 'Leonardo da Vinci';
SELECT * FROM restoration_logs JOIN paintings ON restoration_logs.painting_id = paintings.id;
SELECT * FROM paintings WHERE year_created > 1900 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, artist, year_created FROM paintings WHERE artist LIKE '%Monet%' AND year_created BETWEEN 1880 AND 1900;
SELECT name, restoration_history FROM paintings WHERE restoration_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT p.name, r.restoration_date, c.name AS restorer FROM paintings p INNER JOIN restoration_logs r ON p.id = r.painting_id INNER JOIN conservators c ON r.restorer = c.name;
SELECT artist, COUNT(*) AS total_paintings FROM paintings GROUP BY artist HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_paintings DESC;
SELECT * FROM Paintings;
SELECT painting_name, artist_name, creation_year FROM Paintings ORDER BY creation_year DESC;
SELECT gallery_name, location, contact_person FROM Gallery WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Restoration WHERE restoration_cost > 1000;
SELECT gallery_name, COUNT(*) AS total_paintings FROM Paintings JOIN Gallery ON Paintings.painting_name = Gallery.gallery_name GROUP BY gallery_name;
SELECT * FROM Paintings;
SELECT painting_name, artist_name, creation_year FROM Paintings WHERE creation_year > 1900;
SELECT gallery_name, location FROM Gallery ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT painting_name, artist_name, restoration_cost FROM Paintings p JOIN Restoration r ON p.painting_id = r.painting_id WHERE restoration_cost > 500;
SELECT treatment_date, treatment_description FROM TreatmentHistory WHERE treatment_cost < 1000 ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Paintings;
SELECT painting_name, artist_name FROM Paintings WHERE creation_year < 1900;
SELECT painting_name, artist_name, condition_report FROM Paintings WHERE artist_name = 'Leonardo da Vinci';
SELECT * FROM TreatmentHistory ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT painting_name, conservator_name, report_description FROM ConservationReports JOIN Paintings ON ConservationReports.painting_id = Paintings.painting_id WHERE conservator_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM Paintings;
SELECT painting_name, artist_name, creation_year FROM Paintings;
SELECT painting_id, artist_name, condition_report FROM Paintings WHERE creation_year > 1800;
SELECT report_id, report_date, conservator_name FROM ConservationReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT museum_name, location_address FROM MuseumLocations ORDER BY museum_name DESC;
